attributes.action: let the Blair babes burn a few bars (oops ! I mean bras) - join forces with Jobcentre Plus, the Royal College of Midwives and A4E to highlight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is illeagal to sack a woman because she is pregnant  - pregnancy is NOT a disease - yet this is happening : discrimination is a daily reality for many groups - being a woman and becoming amother should NOT be one of the reasons for disadvantage ! The petitioner is calling on the PM and Rt Hon Denham to over - rule public sector managers and encourage each Jobcentre Plus to display RCM produced materials specially designed to raise awareness of maternity rights and help new mums back to work ... can't beleive these neanderthal men are allowed to get away with this kind of behaviour !
